headlines.description: Philip Billing's goal lifted Bournemouth out of the Premier League relegation zone as they shocked Liverpool to win 1-0.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bournemouth stun Liverpool as Salah misses pen

headlines.description: An early goal from Dwight McNeil earned Everton a precious 1-0 win over Brentford at Goodison Park that dragged them away from the relegation zone.
headlines.shortLinkText: Everton earn vital points with 1-0 win over Brentford

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Leeds United

headlines.description: Jack Harrison scored the equaliser in Leeds United's 2-2 draw with Brighton, making up for the own goal he conceded earlier in the game.
headlines.shortLinkText: Harrison makes up for own goal in Leeds draw with Brighton

headlines.description: — Chelsea's recent revival under Graham Potter continued at Leicester with a 3-1 win in the English Premier League on Saturday, making it three straight wins in all competitions for the London club.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea beats Leicester 3-1 away to ease pressure on Potter

headlines.description: Harry Kane's double helped Tottenham Hotspur to a 3-1 win over Nottingham Forest to cement fourth spot in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kane double helps Spurs tighten grip on top 4

headlines.description: Manchester City needed a second-half penalty from Erling Haaland to break the resistance of Crystal Palace and secure a 1-0 win at Selhurst Park.
headlines.shortLinkText: Late Haaland pen gives Man City win over Palace
